description.title: Advanced fitness and health tracking
text: Track your steps, calories, heart rate, blood oxygen levels, sleep, and more with high-precision sensors like accelerometer, barometer, compass, and PPG heart rate sensor.
Smart features include sleep tracking, smart alarm, and real-time activity monitoring.

description.title: Smart notifications and voice assistant
text: Receive calls, messages, social updates, emails, and calendar events directly on your wrist.
Comes with a built-in microphone and support for voice commands via Google Assistant on Wear OS.

description.title: Stylish build with fast performance
text: Powered by Snapdragon W5+ Gen 1, with 2GB RAM and 32GB storage, the watch runs Google Wear OS smoothly.
Features a 1.43'' AMOLED display (466x466), stainless steel case, and up to 2 days of battery life.

description.title: Advanced fitness and health tracking
text: Track your steps, calories, heart rate, blood oxygen levels, sleep, and more with high-precision sensors like accelerometer, barometer, compass, and PPG heart rate sensor.
Smart features include sleep tracking, smart alarm, and real-time activity monitoring.

description.title: Smart notifications and voice assistant
text: Receive calls, messages, social updates, emails, and calendar events directly on your wrist.
Comes with a built-in microphone and support for voice commands via Google Assistant on Wear OS.

description.title: Stylish build with fast performance
text: Powered by Snapdragon W5+ Gen 1, with 2GB RAM and 32GB storage, the watch runs Google Wear OS smoothly.
Features a 1.43'' AMOLED display (466x466), stainless steel case, and up to 2 days of battery life.

description.title: Track your health and fitness
text: Monitor your heart rate, blood oxygen levels, sleep, stress, and activity with precision thanks to built-in sensors like accelerometer, gyroscope, barometer, and compass.
Set goals and stay active with a reliable step counter, calorie tracker, and motion speed tracking.

description.title: Stay updated with smart notifications
text: Receive alerts for calls, messages, social apps, emails, and calendar events right on your wrist.
Built-in vibration motor ensures you never miss important updates even on the move.

description.title: Durable design with long battery life
text: Features a 1.43'' AMOLED touchscreen with 466x466 resolution and 460 ppi under durable tempered glass.
Aluminum case, 5 ATM water resistance, 486mAh battery offering up to 15 days of use, and magnetic charger included.

text: Receive alerts for calls, messages, social apps, emails, and calendar events right on your wrist.

text: Features a 1.43'' AMOLED touchscreen with 466x466 resolution and 460 ppi under durable tempered glass.
Aluminum case, 5 ATM water resistance, 486mAh battery offering up to 15 days of use, and magnetic charger included.

description.title: Monitor your health
text: Track your heart rate, SpO2, sleep, stress, calories, and activity levels with advanced sensors including a 3-in-1 BioActive sensor and temperature tracking.
Stay on top of your fitness with automatic workout detection and smart wellness insights.

description.title: Stay connected on the go
text: Receive calls, SMS, emails, and app notifications directly on your wrist via Bluetooth and Wi-Fi.
Built-in GPS, NFC, and SOS functionality let you stay safe and connected during your day.

description.title: Premium design, long battery life
text: Featuring a stainless steel case with a mechanical rotating bezel and sapphire glass display, the Watch 6 Classic combines elegance with durability.
Up to 40 hours of battery life and support for fast wireless charging to keep you going longer.

description.title: Monitor your health
text: The Galaxy Watch Ultra features a comprehensive sensor suite to track your heart rate, sleep, stress, and body composition with high precision.
It includes advanced sensors like ECG, temperature, SpO2, and a 3-in-1 BioActive Sensor for deeper health insights.

description.title: Stay connected on the go
text: With eSIM and 4G LTE support, you can make calls, send messages, and stream music without your phone.
Built-in GPS, NFC, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth 5.3 keep you connected anywhere with seamless performance.

description.title: Built to perform, ready for anything
text: A titanium body, sapphire glass, and IP68/10ATM/MIL-STD-810H durability make it ideal for extreme conditions.
Enjoy up to 100 hours of battery life in power-saving mode and fast wireless charging support.

description.title: Monitor your health
text: The Apple Watch Series 3 is equipped with sensors to track your heart rate, calories burned, and other fitness metrics throughout the day. It can even track your workouts and suggest personalized fitness goals.

description.title: Stay connected on the go
text: With cellular connectivity, you can make calls and send texts from your wrist even without your iPhone nearby. And with Siri, you can get directions, send messages, and set reminders hands-free.

description.title: Stream your favorite music
text: With Apple Music and Siri, you can stream over 75 million songs on your Apple Watch Series 3. Or listen to your favorite podcasts, audiobooks, and radio stations.

description.title: Always-On Retina display
text: The Apple Watch Series 6 features an Always-On Retina display that is 2.5 times brighter outdoors when your wrist is down. So you can see all the information on your watch face at a glance.

description.title: Blood oxygen sensor
text: The Blood Oxygen app measures your blood oxygen levels with a revolutionary new sensor and app. You can also take an ECG from your wrist anytime, anywhere.

description.title: Track your daily activity
text: The Apple Watch Series 6 tracks your daily activity including workouts, steps taken, and calories burned. It also has a built-in GPS to track your runs, walks, and hikes.

description.title: Always-On Retina display
text: With the Always-On Retina display, you can easily see the time and important information without raising your wrist. The display is also 30% larger than the Series 3, making it easier to read and interact with.

description.title: ECG app
text: The ECG app can detect irregular heart rhythms and alert you if something seems amiss. You can also take an ECG anytime, anywhere, right from your wrist.

description.title: Larger display
text: The Apple Watch Series 4 has a larger display that lets you see more information at a glance. The display is over 30% larger than the Series 3 and is edge-to-edge with curved corners.

description.title: ECG app
text: With the ECG app, you can take an electrocardiogram right from your wrist. This feature is only available in certain countries and regions.

description.title: Fall detection
text: The Apple Watch Series 4 can detect when you fall and can send an alert to emergency services if you don't respond within a minute. This feature is only available for users over 65 years old.

description.title: Retina display
text: The Apple Watch SE features a Retina display that provides clear and vibrant visuals for easy readability.

description.title: Family Setup
text: With Family Setup, you can pair your Apple Watch SE with a family member's iPhone, so you can stay connected even without owning an iPhone yourself.

description.title: Fitness tracking
text: The Apple Watch SE offers comprehensive fitness tracking features, including activity tracking, heart rate monitoring, and built-in GPS for tracking your outdoor workouts.

description.title: Super AMOLED Display
text: The Galaxy Watch 8 features a bright and energy-efficient 1.5-inch Super AMOLED display with always-on support for vibrant visuals and quick glances.

description.title: Advanced Fitness & Health Tracking
text: Track your heart rate, sleep, blood oxygen, stress, and more with advanced Samsung Health sensors. The Watch 8 supports GPS, automatic workout detection, and personalized health insights.

description.title: Smart Connectivity & Durability
text: Stay connected with Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, manage calls and notifications from your wrist, and use voice assistant features. Water and dust resistant (IP68) with a robust aluminum case.

description.title: Bright AMOLED Display
text: Xiaomi Watch 2 features a 1.43-inch vibrant AMOLED touchscreen with always-on support, providing crisp visuals and smooth navigation even in bright sunlight.

description.title: Comprehensive Health & Fitness Tracking
text: Track heart rate, sleep, blood oxygen, stress, and over 150 sports modes. Built-in GPS and advanced sensors keep you informed and motivated.

description.title: Smart Features & Long Battery
text: Powered by Wear OS, with support for notifications, calls, Google Assistant, and app downloads. Up to 65 hours of battery life and fast charging for all-day use.
